website_summaries.verdict: A great all-purpose athletic shoe. Great for workouts inside and outside the gym, as well as daily wear. Color choices are not hard to match, unlike styles with flashier colors.
pros: Wear running, at the gym or around town running errands
Comes in silver-blue, black and pink
cons: May run small, so consider this when sizing
Not good for customers with high arches

customer_reviews.title: Fitbit compatible
customer_reviews.text: They are hot pink shoes. That's life changing in itself. Updated less than three months later: 1. both shoes have developed holes in the exact same place (see picture). The holes are growing by the day so I won't be able to wear them soon. 2. The bottoms are slick. I work at a grooming shop and the floors are wet often, these are the first shoes I've owned that I'm constantly trying not to fall. I have slipped and fallen more than once; no one else in the shop seems to have the same problem. I'm finding that pink doesn't fix problems. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: J. Clancy

customer_reviews.title: Another FILA winner for me
customer_reviews.text: I generally always buy FILA sneakers because they fit. I wear prescription orthotics, full foot style, that often make it difficult to find shoes which will accommodate these bulky, but necessary, "fillers." FILA sneakers have more rounded toes as well as deeper toe and heel areas...they accommodate my orthotics perfectly. They are light weight (running shoes), which I need due to a foot injury that will not tolerate heavy shoes. This is a nice looking pair of sneakers that I can wear all day.
customer_reviews.author: nvr2amzd

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe, but you'll have to add $$ to get a decent insole unless you have flat feet.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they were on sale. Nice looking. I can wear for a couple of hours per day, but not any longer...until I get some good insoles. I have high arches and these didn't cut it. I have wide feet, but these are a bit wider than expected. I won't be able to do HIIT workouts with super fast explosive moves, side to side jumping, etc. They just won't tie that tight. (A "sloppy" feeling.) Otherwise, for day to day...they're fine!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Klein

customer_reviews.title: usually more like 15, and they feel just as great at ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear these shoes for at least 13 hours at a time, usually more like 15, and they feel just as great at hour 14 as they do at hour 2. I am thrilled that I bought these - and they look great on top of the great fit!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for getting them at $19. Been wearing them for 3 months and no problems yet! The inside sole did slip out once, but I didn't have a sock on so I think it stuck to my foot and pulled it out a little, but haven't had that issue again. Nothing a little super glue couldn't fix! I wear them for running, walking, and everyday activities and have no problems. I really like them for the price! Plus they are pink :)
customer_reviews.author: Colleen P.

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable, But a little narrower
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable , But a little narrower .Still they are good to use at Gym or small walks .I ordered 7-1/2 I usually order that size for Athlete Shoes to walk and use at gyms .Slip- on shoes I order size 7 Both styles of shoes I order Medium Width.The shoes are good enough for my uses.I have 6 pairs of Fila memory athletic Shoes they are good for all day on your feet .
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Cass

customer_reviews.title: Wearing these shoes felt like wearing wood planks
customer_reviews.text: Wearing these shoes felt like wearing wood planks. They don't quite conform to your feet and are super uncomfortable. They have a low ankle and little support on your feet. I am returning these and ordering Asics which I should have just bought to begin with. They are also really hard to tighten which makes them even worse.
customer_reviews.author: Leilani

customer_reviews.title: I said I could wear them comfortably for a couple of hours because that's how long ...
customer_reviews.text: I said I could wear them comfortably for a couple of hours because that's how long I wear them, I think you could probably be comfortable wearing them all day. I love these, I need to use orthotics and they are easy to insert..
customer_reviews.author: No Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy, and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love these a ton they fit great they are cofortable, but they make the feet stink so so bad! Never had I had a pare of shoes that do that maybe they aren't very breathable..I just wash my feet when I get off work, but other then that they are great shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi N

customer_reviews.title: Good show
customer_reviews.text: Bought this pair for my wife after her foot surgery. She needed a shoe that was softer on topand the sides and more flexible in the toe area. They seem to fit the bill and she likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I did not know what to expect ordering shoes without trying them on first but I was pleasantly surprised. These fit true to size and are extraordinarily comfortable. I have worn them a few times now outside and they have stayed clean, the white trim on the bottom is easy to wipe dirt from. I would definitely order again once these wear down, which I don't foresee happening for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: NO Bad shoe!!
customer_reviews.text: These started shredding in less then a month on the soles!! I had purchased another FILA before that lasted me a year. These do not have memory foam comfort of any sorts... you feel the ground as you walk from day one.
customer_reviews.author: M. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Old reliables.
customer_reviews.text: I alternated the with my hikers trekking across Scotland and the held up well. I have wide feet with really high arches, forgot my inserts at home, and my feet did fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne M. Mcdermott

customer_reviews.title: A little too big...
customer_reviews.text: I like these but I think they are a little bit too big for me. I dont usually by FILA so I ordered the size I usually wear, but I think I could have gone down 1/2 size. I added an insole so they are wearable.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Zagaria

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, great price
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, great price. Needed a pair of gym shoes for my daughter to keep in her PE locker. These are a nice, overall pair of athletic shoes. Great price and the FILA brand has always worn well for us. Sizing seems true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Steve K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking sneaker. Bought half size larger. Tend to run small. Likey purchase.
customer_reviews.author: luci morey

customer_reviews.title: I am extremely pleased with my new sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely pleased with my new sneakers. I love the colors, they feel great and I am very happy I ordered them.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Benasher

customer_reviews.title: PRETTY AND VERY COMFORTABLE!
customer_reviews.text: I love them! Fila colors are always so pretty. I have several pair in various colors and styles. Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: EZMERELDA JO

customer_reviews.title: great trail running/hiking shoes
customer_reviews.text: great trail running/hiking shoes. I hike 5 miles a day and needed some inexpensive but supportive shoes and i got these. they also dont slip as much as regular running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: SandyBeach

customer_reviews.title: I'm wearing them sporadically before the trip to break them in and so far they are amazing!! Great product and price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes to wear to Disney World. I'm wearing them sporadically before the trip to break them in and so far they are amazing!! Great product and price. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Harvey

customer_reviews.title: I recommend these!
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable for walking or hiking. Highly recommended especially for the price 😄 These are my first pair of Fila's 😄
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth D.

customer_reviews.title: Good Fit
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 different pair and returned these. I just preferred the look and comfort of the "Asics", which I kept.
customer_reviews.author: NW Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I personally love this brand of shoes especially for the price. They are very comfortable. I bought one size up because they tend to run a little small. These fit perfect. :)
customer_reviews.author: FG

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes for a good price
customer_reviews.text: These are brand new, but my daughter has had Fila brand shoes in the past and I've never been disappointed so far with how well they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. I love the colour and the fit is true to size.It's a bit heavy on the foot compared to other running shoes i own however. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tammi

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe, fair price.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoe. Comfortable, well made and fun colors. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M MSandoval

customer_reviews.title: I use for work shoes
customer_reviews.text: I took out the Fila inserts and use my custom inserts. I wear these all day, approximately 12 hours, on work days.
customer_reviews.author: Maranatha!

customer_reviews.title: Great price though
customer_reviews.text: Not as cushioned as I am used to, but this is my first pair of Filas. Great price though.
customer_reviews.author: kt8301

customer_reviews.title: I only had them for a couple of weeks and ...
customer_reviews.text: I only had them for a couple of weeks and the stitching at the top is coming apart on both shoes. I can fix them myself, but I was hoping to get at least a year out of them before needing to repair them.
customer_reviews.author: WontonTacos

customer_reviews.title: Hulk-colored shoes a smashing success
customer_reviews.text: They're so comfortable and excellent for walking and running. I'm still breaking them in, but I've been pleased at how easy it's been so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Mear

customer_reviews.title: Perfect comfy fit.
customer_reviews.text: These fit perfectly. I like extra room in the toe box and this brand has it and is very lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Good sneaker. I like the extra foot room for thicker socks.
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. On my feet all day long and these ...
customer_reviews.text: One of my fav pairs. Very comfortable. On my feet all day long and these are one pair that doesn't hurt my feet. Very cute shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Yoki

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable and I love the hot pink color!
customer_reviews.author: Pretty Dragonfly

customer_reviews.title: Happy Feet go the distance!
customer_reviews.text: I ran in the Bronco 7K this past Sunday. My feet were VERY Happy!
customer_reviews.author: Dog Mama

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: not comfortable at all, my feet hurt in this styal
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very tough to find comfortable shoes that fit my wide feet. These are great!
customer_reviews.author: lilac ladybug

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I had to say I could wear them comfortably for only a couple hours because that's all the longer I have worn them. But I believe they'll be just as comfortable if worn longer.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota

customer_reviews.title: I like Fila brand
customer_reviews.text: I like Fila brand. I bought half size larger and they just fit, but are comfortable with thin socks. They are light weight and my feet don't get hot.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: I run so I wear them out but they are so comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of this style. I run so I wear them out but they are so comfortable!!
customer_reviews.author: Charbbit

customer_reviews.title: I love, love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love, love these shoes. Very comfortable and very colourful. If you are looking for a light shoe, these are for you. I was looking for something not so heavy to wear to step class and these fit the bill. I first saw them at JCP and they were on sale but did not have my size. When I got home and checked on Amazon, here there were, and even at a better price. Bonus.
customer_reviews.author: 2 CUPS A DAY

customer_reviews.title: Cute, comfortable workout Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to work out in, they are very comfortable. And also cute, I have gotten several compliments on them. Very happy with purchase. Just watch the price, I got them for $25, and then the next week they were $40. Probably still a good deal, but I'm cheap... glad I got them when I did.
customer_reviews.author: stites525

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking; Too Small... ? Mis-Sized?
customer_reviews.text: Shoe was very small, felt that it was sized wrong... returned them, but didn't take a chance on re-ordering them.
customer_reviews.author: Kady Neuhaus

customer_reviews.title: I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I am a true 9.5. These were not only too small but the depth of the shoe is too short, too. I am wearing 9.5 Filas in a similar style as I write this. I don't understand the sizing inconsistency. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jean G.

product_meta.title: Fila Women's Royalty running Shoe
product_meta.description:
Fila running shoes blend both technical and fashion features with top Grade materials, contemporary styling and vivid colors. They look great on the road and also for casual wear with both athletic and every day apparel.

Fila began in 1911, in the small alpine town of Biella, Italy, a place renowned for manufacturing the world's finest textiles, and weaving fabrics with impeccable quality, true innovation and extraordinary beauty. Born of the city and its traditions, Fila is inexorably derived from Biella's dedication to artistry, luxury and elegance. This is our birthright, it's in our soul, and it defines our future. We continue to enrich the athletic experience by improving comfort and performance with Italian design, quality craftsmanship and refined materials. There is no feeling quite as luxurious as that of playing in Fila, and that is the reason for our existence. We create what is desired, not what is necessary. Not just enough, but more than you need. This is Fila.
feature_bullets: Running shoe featuring breathable/flexible nylon mesh upper with logo detailing, toe overlay, and padded collar
Rubber compound outsole for traction and durability
